entry.title: SPECIAL WEATHER STATEMENT , Squamish
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 05:57 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: 4.6°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Squamish Airport 11:00 AM PST Friday 27 January 2023
Temperature: 4.6°C
Pressure / Tendency: 102.4 kPa falling
Humidity: 88 %
Dewpoint: 2.8°C
Wind: NW 5 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 1
